name: Invoice Design
description:
This is an invoice design for anyone to use. I created this when I was struggling to create mine.

When I was building this, I took some references from other invoices and did some research about what credentials are necessary as per the Goods and Services Tax Act of 2017 in India, and this is what I came up with.

I hope it helps others as well.


Also I'd love to connect with people in UI/UX field. So feel free to say "Hi" on my Instagram or Twitter and Thank you for reading this far.
